channel.title: A practitioner's journal
channel.description: Recent content on A practitioner's journal

item.title: Using Hugo and Git
item.description: I’ve spent an hour trying to figure out why Hugo can post new posts but does not delete when i remove the ‘.md’ file. Apparently when you use the ‘hugo’ command to construct the site (which pushes it to a directory that I can git push from) it will not do a ‘clean’ and remove files.

item.title: Sun Shiny Security
item.description: I do post to Twitter a bunch, but I’m going to use this site for longer posts, but really not too much longer. Mostly I just need a place to vent my thoughts.
